content: In this first episode of the new year, we explore the objective unsustainability of global social and economic trends and what that may mean for how to show up in your life today.
summary: In this first episode of the new year, we explore the objective unsustainability of global social and economic trends and what that may mean for how to show up in your life today.
title: Unsustainable

content: We humans sure do love to find new and novel ways to sow division amongst ourselves, don’t we? In this episode we explore our innate drive to carve ourselves into groups and what good it’s doing us.
summary: We humans sure do love to find new and novel ways to sow division amongst ourselves, don’t we? In this episode we explore our innate drive to carve ourselves into groups and what good it’s doing us.
title: Us vs. them

content: What even IS a creative process? Whether you think you know, or know you don’t know, join us to go deeper on what it means to create and to be creative.
summary: What even IS a creative process? Whether you think you know, or know you don’t know, join us to go deeper on what it means to create and to be creative.
